name: exl-touchnet-connector
description: Connector between Ex Libris Alma and Primo and the Touchnet payment system

scripts.hosted:package: aws cloudformation package --template ./hosted.yaml --s3-bucket almadtest --output-template hosted.packaged.yaml --region us-east-1 --s3-prefix sam
scripts.hosted:deploy: npm run hosted:package && aws cloudformation deploy --template-file hosted.packaged.yaml --stack-name TouchnetConnectorHosted --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region us-east-1
scripts.hosted:describe: aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name TouchnetConnectorHosted --region us-east-1 --query 'Stacks[0].Outputs[*].{Key:OutputKey,Value:OutputValue,Description:Description}' --output table
scripts.lambdadev: TARGET_PORT=3000 node test/primo.js & sam local start-api --env-vars test/env.json

author: Josh Weisman
